set(ANY_LITE_PROJECT_DIR "${EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR}/any-lite")

UpdateExternalLib("any-lite" "https://github.com/martinmoene/any-lite.git" "56cdca9c94af84c6e643a05c9105cb1dc38c5d8c")

set(ANY_LITE_OPT_BUILD_EXAMPLES OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(ANY_LITE_OPT_BUILD_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(ANY_LITE_OPT_SELECT_NONSTD OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(ANY_LITE_OPT_SELECT_STD ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)

add_subdirectory(${ANY_LITE_PROJECT_DIR} "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/any-lite" EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
